title: MAKING ARTICLES FROM LEATHER, CANVAS, OR THE LIKE
definition_statement: This place covers: Making articles (e.g. handbags or wallets) from leather, canvas, or the like; machines or equipment specially adapted for saddle-making.

title: Making articles from leather, canvas, or the like  (machines or equipment for saddle-making B68F3/00; manufacturing footwear A43D; manufacture and treatment of leather in general, splitting leather, manufacture of driving or other belts C14)
definition_statement: This place covers: Making articles (e.g. handbags or wallets) from leather, canvas, or the like; methods for saddle-making.

title: Machines or equipment specially adapted for saddle-making  (methods B68F1/00)
definition_statement: This place covers: Machines and hand tools for saddle-making.
